phabricatorlogin-desc: Enables OAuth2 Login over a Phabricator OAuth2 Server
phabricatorlogin-login-with-phab: You can login to this Wiki with your Phabricator Account
phabricatorlogin-already-exists:
This Account already exists.
Please go back and choose a different option.
phabricatorlogin-wrong-password:
Wrong credentials.
Please go back and try again
phabricator-chooseinstructions: Please enter your preferred username or choose an existing user to connect to your Phabricator account
